roleset.name: to tie
roleset.note: LASH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'lash' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from lash.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: The State Department denied asylum to a Vietnamese man who [*T*-129]-1 escaped from his homeland by [*-1]lashing himself to the rudder housing of a tanker for two days in monsoon seas .
example.arg: to the rudder housing of a tanker
for two days in monsoon seas

example.name: with Arg1
example.text: [Rep. Gonzalez]-1 seems primed [*-1]to lash out at Mr. Wall when hearings resume Thursday with testimony by two federal regulators from San Francisco , William Black and Mike Patriarca [*T*-2] .
example.arg: when hearings resume Thursday with testimony by two federal regulators from San Francisco , William Black and Mike Patriarca [*T*-2]
